item.title: Exploring the Book of Esther in the Tidy Verse
item.description: There is much to be learned in the form of writing and the relationship it has within and outside the text. The question we might want to ask is there a way to identify the story arc of the situation. Using spacy to tag all of the words will increase the likelyhood to better understand the Create the Data Frame TODO: Need to make sure to figure out the book regex to include books such as 1 Timothy where there are parts of the book
